Package org.radarbase.management.security

Class PostgresApprovalStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.radarbase.management.security.PostgresApprovalStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.approval.ApprovalStore
    public class PostgresApprovalStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.approval.ApprovalStore
    This class will be used to execute functions related to token approval. It is an duplicate of JdbcApprovalStore with escaped case sensitive fields to query.
